Vice President Corporate Strategy at InMobi Group
Vice President Corporate Strategy at InMobi Group
2mo ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ 
 2 months ago ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
Growing up color blind, there were quite a few artistic mishaps


My oldest memory: A tree I proudly painted with vibrant ‚Äúbrown‚Äù leaves & a striking ‚Äúgreen‚Äù trunk


Fast forward to playing with Glance AI... the first outcome was equally "not quite right‚Äù. This sparkly suit is fun but definitely no me üòÇ


The second one: V sweater with folded sleeves, A brown belt with beige trousers. I liked seeing it.


Honestly, I would have never tried this. I am a dark denims, black belts & solid colored T-Shirts kinda guy


For someone who sees colors differently & finds shopping a chore, GlanceAI offered a genuine Aha.


We are launching this on *Thursday, May 22nd* An effortless style discovery, regardless of your visual perception for fashion. Works for colorblinds too :)
